capital/find-spinel.title: Ghoul Power
capital/find-spinel.give-spinel: Give the electromagic spinel to Rotten Gear
capital/find-spinel.description: Rotten Gear, in the ruins of the capital, is having trouble with Ashaven's power generator. He needs to replace a rare mineral with magical properties: an electromagic spinel.
capital/find-spinel.description-steel-ranger-hint: According to Rotten Gear, the Steel Rangers should have a few of those in stock... but they religiously keep that stuff for themselves.
